sn14:1.1.3_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
sn14:1.1.4_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
sn14:2.1.4_0: Cakkhudhātu sotadhātu ghānadhātu jivhādhātu kāyadhātu manodhātu—
sn14:2.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dhātunānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattaṁ?
sn14:2.2.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, dhātunānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati phassanānattan”ti.
sn14:3.2.3_0: manodhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati manosamphasso, no manosamphassaṁ paṭicca uppajjati manodhātu.
sn14:4.2.3_0: manodhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati manosamphasso, manosamphassaṁ paṭicca uppajjati manosamphassajā vedanā.
sn14:5.2.2_4: no cakkhusamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati cakkhusamphasso,
sn14:5.2.3_2: no manosamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati manosamphasso,
sn14:6.1.5_0: Rūpadhātu saddadhātu gandhadhātu rasadhātu phoṭṭhabbadhātu dhammadhātu—
sn14:8.3.2_0: dhammadhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati dhammasaññā, dhammasaññaṁ paṭicca uppajjati …pe… dhammapariyesanā;
sn14:10.1.10_0: no pariyesanānānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati pariḷāhanānattaṁ, no pariḷāhanānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati …pe…
sn14:10.1.15_0: saññānānattaṁ, no saññānānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati dhātunānattaṁ.
sn14:10.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, dhātunānattaṁ paṭicca uppajjati saññānānattaṁ,
sn14:10.3.2_0: dhammadhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati dhammasaññā, dhammasaññaṁ paṭicca uppajjati …pe…
sn14:10.3.4_3: no dhammacchandaṁ paṭicca uppajjati dhammasamphassajā vedanā,
sn14:10.3.4_4: no dhammasamphassajaṁ vedanaṁ paṭicca uppajjati dhammasamphasso,
sn14:11.2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn14:11.2.2_1: ābhādhātu yā ca subhadhātu yā ca ākāsānañcāyatanadhātu yā ca viññāṇañcāyatanadhātu yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanadhātu
sn14:11.2.2_2: yā ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhātu yā ca saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu—imā nu kho, bhante,
sn14:11.3.1_0: “Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, ābhādhātu—ayaṁ dhātu andhakāraṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.2_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, subhadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu asubhaṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.3_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, ākāsānañcāyatanadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu rūpaṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.4_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, viññāṇañcāyatanadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.5_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, ākiñcaññāyatanadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.6_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ paṭicca paññāyati.
sn14:11.3.7_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu nirodhaṁ paṭicca paññāyatī”ti.
sn14:11.4.1_1: ābhādhātu yā ca subhadhātu yā ca ākāsānañcāyatanadhātu yā ca viññāṇañcāyatanadhātu yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanadhātu
sn14:11.4.1_2: yā ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhātu yā ca saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu—imā nu kho, bhante,
sn14:11.5.1_1: ābhādhātu yā ca subhadhātu yā ca ākāsānañcāyatanadhātu yā ca viññāṇañcāyatanadhātu yā ca ākiñcaññāyatanadhātu—imā dhātuyo saññāsamāpatti pattabbā.
sn14:11.5.2_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti pattabbā.
sn14:11.5.3_0: Yāyaṁ, bhikkhu, saññāvedayitanirodhadhātu—ayaṁ dhātu nirodhasamāpatti pattabbā”ti.
sn14:12.2.3_2: pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.3.2_2: pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.4.2_2: pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.5.1_2: puriso ādittaṁ tiṇukkaṁ sukkhe tiṇadāye nikkhipeyya;
sn14:12.5.1_3: no ce hatthehi ca pādehi ca khippameva nibbāpeyya. Evañhi,
sn14:12.5.1_5: ye tiṇakaṭṭhanissitā pāṇā te anayabyasanaṁ āpajjeyyuṁ.
sn14:12.5.2_2: yo hi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā uppannaṁ visamagataṁ saññaṁ na khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti,
sn14:12.5.2_3: so diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhaṁ viharati savighātaṁ saupāyāsaṁ sapariḷāhaṁ;
sn14:12.5.3_0: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
sn14:12.7.7_2: pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.8.6_2: pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.9.6_2: pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—kāyena, vācāya, manasā.
sn14:12.10.1_2: puriso ādittaṁ tiṇukkaṁ sukkhe tiṇadāye nikkhipeyya;
sn14:12.10.1_3: tamenaṁ hatthehi ca pādehi ca khippameva nibbāpeyya. Evañhi,
sn14:12.10.1_5: ye tiṇakaṭṭhanissitā pāṇā te na anayabyasanaṁ āpajjeyyuṁ.
sn14:12.10.2_2: yo hi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā uppannaṁ visamagataṁ saññaṁ khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti,
sn14:12.10.2_3: so diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
sn14:12.10.3_0: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
sn14:13.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā ñātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
sn14:13.2.1_0: “Dhātuṁ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati saññā, uppajjati diṭṭhi, uppajjati vitakko”ti.
sn14:13.2.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā kaccāno bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn14:13.2.4_0: ‘asammāsambuddhesu sammāsambuddhā’ti, ayaṁ nu kho, bhante, diṭṭhi kiṁ paṭicca paññāyatī”ti?
sn14:13.3.1_0: “Mahati kho esā, kaccāna, dhātu yadidaṁ avijjādhātu.
sn14:13.3.3_0: hīnaṁ ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti;
sn14:13.4.2_0: majjhimaṁ ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti;
sn14:13.5.2_0: paṇītaṁ ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti;
sn14:14.2.1_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
sn14:14.3.1_0: Anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandissanti samessanti.
sn14:14.4.1_0: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:15.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn14:15.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.3_0: āyasmāpi kho mahāmoggallāno sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.4_0: āyasmāpi kho mahākassapo sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.5_0: āyasmāpi kho anuruddho sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.6_0: āyasmāpi kho puṇṇo mantāniputto sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.7_0: āyasmāpi kho upāli sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.8_0: āyasmāpi kho ānando sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati;
sn14:15.1.9_0: devadattopi kho sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhagavato avidūre caṅkamati.
sn14:15.2.2_0: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, sāriputtaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.5_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, moggallānaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.8_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, kassapaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.11_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, anuruddhaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.14_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, puṇṇaṁ mantāniputtaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.17_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, upāliṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.20_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, ānandaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.2.23_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, devadattaṁ sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ caṅkamantan”ti?
sn14:15.3.4_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
sn14:15.4.1_0: Anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandissanti samessanti.
sn14:15.5.1_0: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.1.4_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
sn14:16.2.1_0: Anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandissanti samessanti.
sn14:16.3.1_0: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.4.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gūtho gūthena saṁsandati sameti;
sn14:16.4.6_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.4.10_0: etarahipi kho paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.5.3_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
sn14:16.6.2_0: etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.7.1_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, khīraṁ khīrena saṁsandati sameti;
sn14:16.7.6_0: evameva kho, bhikkhave, dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.7.10_0: etarahipi kho paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:16.8.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
sn14:17.2.1_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu.
sn14:17.3.1_0: Anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandissanti samessanti.
sn14:17.4.1_0: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:17.5.11_0: etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:18.1.9_0: Atītampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandiṁsu samiṁsu …pe…
sn14:18.1.10_0: anāgatampi kho, bhikkhave, addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandissanti samessanti …pe….
sn14:18.2.1_0: Etarahipi kho, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṁ addhānaṁ dhātusova sattā saṁsandanti samenti.
sn14:18.2.3_0: ahirikā ahirikehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti, duppaññā duppaññehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:25.2.1_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā pāṇātipātā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:25.2.2_0: adinnādānā paṭiviratā adinnādānā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:25.2.3_0: kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:25.2.4_0: musāvādā paṭiviratā musāvādā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:25.2.5_0: surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī”ti.
sn14:26.2.5_0: pisuṇāya vācāya paṭiviratā pisuṇāya vācāya paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:26.2.6_0: pharusāya vācāya paṭiviratā pharusāya vācāya paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:26.2.7_0: samphappalāpā paṭiviratā samphappalāpā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samentī”ti.
sn14:27.2.1_0: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā pāṇātipātā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:27.2.7_0: samphappalāpā paṭiviratā samphappalāpā paṭiviratehi saddhiṁ saṁsandanti samenti;
sn14:30.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme …
sn14:31.1.2_0: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn14:31.1.3_0: ‘ko nu kho pathavīdhātuyā assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
sn14:31.1.4_0: ko āpodhātuyā assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
sn14:31.1.5_0: ko tejodhātuyā assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
sn14:31.1.6_0: ko vāyodhātuyā assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
sn14:31.2.2_0: ‘yaṁ kho pathavīdhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ pathavīdhātuyā assādo;
sn14:31.2.3_0: yaṁ pathavīdhātu aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavo;
sn14:31.2.4_0: yo pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ pathavīdhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ.
sn14:31.2.7_0: yaṁ vāyodhātuṁ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ vāyodhātuyā assādo;
sn14:31.2.8_0: yaṁ vāyodhātu aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṁ vāyodhātuyā ādīnavo;
sn14:31.2.9_0: yo vāyodhātuyā chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṁ, idaṁ vāyodhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ’.
sn14:31.3.1_2: imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ na abbhaññāsiṁ,
sn14:31.3.1_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn14:31.4.1_2: imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ evaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ,
sn14:31.4.1_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn14:31.4.3_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn14:32.1.2_4: yāvatā pathavīdhātuyā assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn14:32.1.3_4: yāvatā pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn14:32.1.4_4: yāvatā pathavīdhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn14:32.2.3_4: yāvatā vāyodhātuyā assādo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn14:32.2.4_4: yāvatā vāyodhātuyā ādīnavo paññāya me so sudiṭṭho.
sn14:32.2.5_4: yāvatā vāyodhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ paññāya me taṁ sudiṭṭhaṁ.
sn14:32.3.1_2: imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ na abbhaññāsiṁ,
sn14:32.3.1_5: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn14:32.4.1_2: imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, athāhaṁ,
sn14:32.4.1_4: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṁ.
sn14:32.4.3_0: ‘akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo’”ti.
sn14:33.1.2_0: “No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuyā assādo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā pathavīdhātuyā sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn14:33.1.3_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi pathavīdhātuyā assādo, tasmā sattā pathavīdhātuyā sārajjanti.
sn14:33.1.4_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn14:33.1.5_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavo, tasmā sattā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindanti.
sn14:33.1.6_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā pathavīdhātuyā nissareyyuṁ.
sn14:33.1.7_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi pathavīdhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā pathavīdhātuyā nissaranti.
sn14:33.2.1_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, āpodhātuyā assādo abhavissa …pe…
sn14:33.2.3_0: no cedaṁ, bhikkhave, vāyodhātuyā assādo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā vāyodhātuyā sārajjeyyuṁ.
sn14:33.2.4_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vāyodhātuyā assādo, tasmā sattā vāyodhātuyā sārajjanti.
sn14:33.2.5_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, vāyodhātuyā ādīnavo abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā vāyodhātuyā nibbindeyyuṁ.
sn14:33.2.6_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vāyodhātuyā ādīnavo, tasmā sattā vāyodhātuyā nibbindanti.
sn14:33.2.7_0: No cedaṁ, bhikkhave, vāyodhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ abhavissa, nayidaṁ sattā vāyodhātuyā nissareyyuṁ.
sn14:33.2.8_0: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vāyodhātuyā nissaraṇaṁ, tasmā sattā vāyodhātuyā nissaranti.
sn14:33.3.1_2: sattā imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ na abbhaññaṁsu,
sn14:33.3.1_5: sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādikatena cetasā vihariṁsu.
sn14:33.4.1_2: sattā imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca assādato ādīnavañca ādīnavato nissaraṇañca nissaraṇato yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññaṁsu, atha,
sn14:33.4.1_4: sattā sadevakā lokā samārakā sabrahmakā sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya nissaṭā visaṁyuttā vippamuttā vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantī”ti.
sn14:34.1.2_2: ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn14:34.1.3_2: pathavīdhātu sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn14:34.2.3_2: ekantadukkhā abhavissa dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn14:34.2.4_2: vāyodhātu sukhā sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn14:34.3.1_2: ekantasukhā abhavissa sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn14:34.3.2_2: pathavīdhātu dukkhā dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn14:34.4.3_2: ekantasukhā abhavissa sukhānupatitā sukhāvakkantā anavakkantā dukkhena,
sn14:34.4.4_2: vāyodhātu dukkhā dukkhānupatitā dukkhāvakkantā anavakkantā sukhena,
sn14:35.1.2_0: “Yo, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn14:35.1.3_0: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14:35.1.6_0: yo vāyodhātuṁ abhinandati, dukkhaṁ so abhinandati.
sn14:35.1.7_0: Yo dukkhaṁ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14:35.2.1_0: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavīdhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn14:35.2.2_0: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn14:35.2.5_0: yo vāyodhātuṁ nābhinandati, dukkhaṁ so nābhinandati.
sn14:35.2.6_0: Yo dukkhaṁ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
sn14:36.1.2_3: dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṁ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn14:36.1.5_0: yo vāyodhātuyā uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo,
sn14:36.1.5_1: dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṁ ṭhiti jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo.
sn14:36.2.1_3: dukkhasseso nirodho rogānaṁ vūpasamo jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo.
sn14:36.2.4_1: dukkhasseso nirodho rogānaṁ vūpasamo jarāmaraṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
sn14:37.1.5_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
sn14:37.1.6_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā;
sn14:37.1.6_3: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn14:37.2.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti,
sn14:37.2.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā;
sn14:37.2.2_3: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
sn14:38.1.5_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā imāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti …pe…
sn14:39.1.2_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā pathavīdhātuṁ nappajānanti,
sn14:39.1.5_3: vāyodhātunirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ nappajānanti, na me te,
sn14:39.1.5_5: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu vā samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu vā brāhmaṇasammatā;
sn14:39.1.6_0: na ca pana te āyasmanto sāmaññatthaṁ vā brahmaññatthaṁ vā diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
sn14:39.2.1_2: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā pathavīdhātuṁ pajānanti,
sn14:39.2.2_0: ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā …pe… āpodhātuṁ pajānanti …
sn14:39.2.4_6: samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā samaṇesu ceva samaṇasammatā brāhmaṇesu ca brāhmaṇasammatā;
sn14:39.2.5_0: te ca panāyasmanto sāmaññatthañca brahmaññatthañca diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
